sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.InteractionUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>InteractionUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var InteractionUtil = Class.create();
InteractionUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    updateInteractionDuration: function(interactionId, durationInSeconds) {
		var date = new GlideDateTime('1970-01-01');
		date.addSeconds(durationInSeconds);
        var interaction_Gr = new GlideRecord('interaction');
		
        if (interaction_Gr.get(interactionId)) {
            interaction_Gr.setValue('duration', date.getValue());
            interaction_Gr.update();
        }
    },

    type: 'InteractionUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-31 09:36:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7d66a6a59733cd1078ea7f871153af84</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>InteractionUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">ad7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f75</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7d66a6a59733cd1078ea7f871153af84</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-31 11:05:00</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
